title: Add user settings page with dark mode toggle
body:
## Description

Users have requested the ability to toggle dark mode in the application settings.

### Requirements
- Add a new settings page accessible from the user menu
- Include a toggle switch for dark mode
- Persist the preference in local storage
- Apply theme changes immediately without page reload

### Design Notes
- Use existing button/toggle components from our UI library
- Follow the current settings page layout pattern
- Consider accessibility (prefers-color-scheme media query)

### Out of Scope
- Custom color themes (just light/dark for now)
- Per-page theme settings
